data.name: LeagueOfTabletopGames
data.description:
League of Tabletop Games, ignite your excitement with friends!üî•

A variety of popular board games including Chess, Ludo, Landlord (Dou Di Zhu) and Chinese Chess at your leisure that supports multiplayer (Dou Di Zhu and Chinese Chess), avatars and MR mode. 

Step into a relaxing and joyful game hall, pick up the game pieces, and traverse multiple exciting parallel worlds for a tabletop game party! 

„ÄêGame Features„Äë 
 üÉè Classic Four-in-One: Experience the ultimate challenge with our integrated collection of diverse chess games, compete online against multiple players and prove that you‚Äôre the true champion!
üòº Realistic Physics Interactions: Inspect the board directly through the controllers, truly feeling the shape, color, and other attributes of each piece in the virtual world!
 üëæ Smart AI Companion: Experience challenging gameplay against human-like AI opponents that will put your skills to the test!
 üèïÔ∏è Various Game Scenes: Include a forest campsite, an afternoon room, a traditional lakeside pavilion, and a trendy Landlord scene!
 üòé MR Support: Experience the intersection of virtual and real worlds as chessboards and pieces are projected into reality for manipulation and gameplay!

„ÄêJoin Us„Äë
We sincerely invite you to join the official Discord(https://discord.gg/rwza6q9njM) to meet other players online, share game experiences, make like-minded friends, and communicate with our development team at any time to obtain the latest development progress, free keys, etc.
